title: Game crashing mid champ select!

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: This happens every other champ select pretty much.  Everything is going smoothly then all of a sudden someone's timer will go to 0, as shown in the link, and it will just sit there untill I dodge champ select.  Ultimately losing LP.  I've probably lost over 50 LP from this.  Will u please figure out why this is happening.

replies.body: Crashing in champion select is often caused by third party programs that aren't interacting with league properly.  If you have any apps running like play.tv or overlay, remove them.  That should fix you up, but if not let me know with more details like error messages.
